description:
Tabitha is one of the Magma Admins of Team Magma.
Tabitha appeared in several episodes of the Pok√©mon anime.
Due to a dubbing error, Tabitha was referred to as `Field Commander Harland` in his first appearance in "A Three Team Scheme". This is also true for his second appearance in "The Spheal Of Approval". In his next appearance in "Fight for the Meteorite", the error was corrected.
His appearance in the anime is very different from the manga.
name: Homura
